EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.SmartIPNet.none.T.G.G.11251.Smart IP Network webcast.04 - Follow up
EmailTemplate.subject: Relive the Nokia “IP Networks Reimagined” 360° livestream!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Relive the Nokia “IP Networks Reimagined” 360° livestream! Thank you for viewing our 360° livestream, IP Networks Reimagined, to learn about Nokia’s vision and strategy on the evolution of IP networks. We hope you enjoyed it!
If you would like to watch it again or were unable to attend the live event, you can access the recording here <[[https://pages.nokia.com/11251.IP-Networks-Reimagined-LP.html]]>.
For more information on how you can reimagine your IP network, download our executive summary <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201268]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
